thread.section_title: Hotel Forte - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great Location
thread.title_full: Great Location - Review of Hotel Forte, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: Terry A
title: Great Location
text:
My wife and I spent a week at this 3 star hotel Dec 30 to Jan 6 2016-7.Rooms were small, could barely turn around in the shower, which has no heat, and it took us several days to get an English speaking TV channel, and those were old movies and TV series. Rooms were clean and the bed was good. Breakfast was great with plenty of goodies. Location is great as was the price. We were less than a block from the Spanish Steps. Staff was very friendly and helpful. Hotel has been around since 1923. They were able to book us a car to take us to the airport cheaper and nicer than a taxi
Room Tip: Rooms with an outside view are good See more room tips
